think.title: Think intelligent, practical and comfortable spaces
think.subtitle: Passionate about architecture and design, our mission is to provide you with a unique and memorable experience.

build.title: Build a strong relationship and quality partnership
build.subtitle: Driven by our desire for perfection, we do everything to ensure you are more than satisfied with our work.

live.title: We Collaborate with You to Make Your Dreams a Reality!
live.subtitle: Your home is one of the most important investments you will make in your life. Choose a sure and unparalleled value with Les Constructions Dominic Cyr Inc.

features.title: Tailored Support
features.intro: Les Constructions Dominic Cyr Inc. is a dynamic family business with over 20 years of experience in residential construction. We are here to guide you in bringing your ideas and projects to life, providing personalized, professional service built on transparency.

contact.title: Let's Build Your Dream Home Together
contact.description: Your home is one of the most important investments you'll ever make. Choose a trusted partner with Dominic Cyr Construction Inc.
